fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 336: Apocalypse will always spawn
- Factional douse that the Apocalypse can ignite.
- Factional chat
- If the Apocalypse dies, a random Underworld Offensive member will be promoted to the Apocalypse if possible. Otherwise, another random Underworld member will be promoted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Light the Town aflame and leave no enemies alive.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Light the Town aflame and leave no enemies alive.
